snippet: Nick Kyrgios and Bernard Tomic gave Australia an unwanted reputation as a breeding ground for tennis brats during a tempestuous 2015 and the pair will be firmly under the spotlight in front of home crowds at Melbourne Park....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios and Bernard Tomic gave Australia an unwanted reputation as a breeding ground for tennis brats during a tempestuous 2015 and the pair will be firmly under the spotlight in front of home crowds at Melbourne Park.

headline.print_headline: Australia Hoping Bad Boys Come Good in Melbourne
headline.main: Australia Hoping Bad Boys Come Good in Melbourne
